name: CUBE OF THE WORLD
description:
This is 2D platformer game. You need to collect coins and unlock levels.

Controls: A and D to move, SPACE to jump, DOUBLE SPACE to double jump.

Featured: Ladders and jumpads will be added to the game, bug fixes and more levels.

Developer: I'm Marko Smiljic. I'm 12 years old. I love to develop games and I love digital art.
